price: 85. Toen hij tegen zijn vader en zijn volk zei: “Wat is dat wat jullie aanbidden?”
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
